thread.section_title: sellbackyourBook.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of sellbackyourBook.com | sellbackyourbook.com | 8 of 337
thread.title: Cara

author: Cara
title: Cara
text:
The good: I was ecstatic when I discovered sellbackyourbook.com. I had several older textbooks that I knew I would not use again. Ultimately, 8 of them had value. The mailing process is simple and prepaid. The library would not take them and I could not bring myself to throw them in the trash.
I ended up with $97 for them.
The bad: My most expensive book was reported as "not sent." This book was worth $72 and made the whole process worthwhile. When I packed, I put them in order of the shipping slip list, then counted to confirm. I was more than a little angry when I got the email saying it was not shipped.
All in all I appreciate this service.
